mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_info(sellerId, sellerName, busiName, category,prdName, stock, price, discount) values(#{sellerId}, #{sellerName}, #{busiName}, #{category},#{prdName}, #{stock}, #{price}, #{discount})
mapper.select: select pno from tbl_product_info where sellerId=#{sellerId} order by regDate desc limit 1
